report.title: Languages for species list viewer
report.description: Get languages for species list viewer parameter.
report.query: SELECT 0 as id, 'all' as iso, 'All' as language UNION SELECT distinct #columns# FROM languages l JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.language_iso = l.iso AND cttl.taxon_list_id in (251,260,261,265) WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.id != 2 ORDER BY id
